tool_description: Executes migration scripts against target database with progress tracking, error handling, and rollback capabilities.

host.description: Target database server hostname or IP address

dry_run.description: Whether to perform a dry run without actual execution

continue_on_error.description: Whether to continue execution after non-critical errors

rollback_on_failure.description: Whether to automatically rollback on script failure

error_messages: Connection failed: Unable to connect to target database for deployment.
Permission denied: User lacks privileges to execute DDL statements.
Script execution failed: Migration script failed during execution.
Rollback failed: Automatic rollback encountered errors during execution.
Timeout error: Script execution exceeded maximum allowed time.
Transaction error: Database transaction failed or was aborted.
usage: Connect to target database and execute migration script with specified options for error handling and rollback behavior.

executed_steps.description: Number of script steps successfully executed

failed_steps.description: Number of script steps that failed

execution_time.description: Total time taken for script execution
